column4: please i need help ! i install ubuntu and i want get my windows 7 back ( i want in windows boot manager look http://www.theeldergeekvista.com/images/Vista Dual Boot Installation/Vista Final -0037.jpg )

please i need help ! i install ubuntu and i want get my windows 7 back ( i want in windows boot manager look http://www.theeldergeekvista.com/images/Vista Dual Boot Installation/Vista Final -0037.jpg )
what do you mean you want to get win7 back?.. did you install ubuntu over win7?
are you sure you didn't install ubuntu over win7?.. is win7 still ont he system?
i understand that... all i'm asking, is are you sure when you intalled ubuntu, you didn't accidentally install it over win7
can you still see your Win7 partitions from Ubuntu, or gparted
